actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to utilization of parking facilities within the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Denies authority to the District of Columbia Council to impose any rule or regulation on parking which is more restrictive on nonresidents of the District than on residents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to utilization of parking facilities within the District of Columbia.
